The claim made by Gov: Scott Walker is that some Democrats running for governor want to cut the prison population by 50%.
The first aspect employed to verify the: two Democratic candidates who expressed their support for cutting the state's prison population in half.
The second aspect is the statement made: Kathleen Vinehout, who also expressed support for the idea of reducing the inmate population by 50%.
The third aspect is the information prov: Scott Walker's campaign, which argues that 67% of state prison inmates have committed at least one violent offense, suggesting that achieving a 50% reduction would require the release of thousands of violent felons.
